reviewText: This product was "OK" at best.  I wasn't sure what to expect, therefore my expectations were not high.  It's entertainment value was decent, with your typical "porno" storyline.  What guy wouldn't want to be caught in the middle of two women competing for his attention?  I think I've seen other movies like that... However, being an animated movie, well... That's just weird.  What I particularly did NOT like about the flick, was the redundant clips used to drag out the scenes.  All in all, if you're curious, like I was, check it out. If you're not curious at all... don't waste your time or your money.

As an adult anime this almost works. The storyline is ridiculous, but not an issue as this is an adult fantasy. A smoking hot mother and daughter compete sexually for the same guy. Each of the ladies is more than amply endowed. There are actually two 30 minute episodes on this DVD.

In the first boy meets girl at school and she invites him over to help her study. Doesn't take long before the clothes are off and deeds are being done. The next night he comes back for more and is intercepted by the mother who quickly seduces him and tells him not to mess with the daughter. Naturally he jumps the daughter first chance he gets and has to deal with the mother. In the unreal world of anime this leads to an encounter with both women at the same time.

The second episode is about the girl running away from home. She goes to the boys house and procedes to get domestic. Shortly thereafter the mother arrives and that leads to another threesome.

The real problem with the "movie" is that the artwork is rather primitive and really is more of an early anime for TV level, if that. This lack of quality drawing really hurts the overall eroticism of this dvd. The girls are gorgeous but the overall lack of natural movement leaves this anime in the "it was okay" file.

Adult animation is always tricky and one do not know is it going to have a story line or not. This adult dvd is very well written and has a begining and an end that is romantic and touching. This dvd is worth seeing.
A brilliant homage to the Irving Berlin Classic. What wit, what panache, buy it by all means!

As an anime and hentai fan this was a disappointment from almost start to finish.  The animation and repetition of scenes reminded me of cheap hentai games where you have to gain points to eventually get "intimate" with a girl.  The packaging art is better than any found in the video.  For real hentai I suggest Bible Black or some other title.
